snippet: The company has begun talks with major media companies about licensing TV channels, according to people with knowledge of the meetings.
abstract: Google has begun talks with major media companies about licensing TV channels; no deals are imminent, but meetings are sign of newfound race to sell cablelike services via the Internet, creating alternative to current television packages that 100 million American households buy.
lead_paragraph: The company has begun talks with major media companies about licensing TV channels, according to people with knowledge of the meetings.

headline.main: Google Said to Weigh Supplying TV Channels
headline.print_headline: Google Said To Weigh Supplying TV Channels
